content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hi, I need someone to check my AC. Can you give me a price first?
Thanks for reaching out about your AC. I can help with that! May I have your name so I can get started with an estimate and set up your booking?
Thank you, Julia! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm you’re in our service area and get you a price estimate for AC service?
Thanks! One moment while I check your address and get that price estimate for you.
I’m sorry, but I’m unable to retrieve a price estimate for your AC service right now. I’m requesting assistance from a team member to help with your request. We’ll follow up as soon as possible.
reason: Agent unable to provide price estimate; help requested.
